name: Course on Metallurgy for Class 12
description: Piyush Maheshwari will cover the topic of metallurgy. It will be helpful for students preparing for IIT JEE. The course will be completed in 13 days approximately and comprises 6 sessions with a duration of 90 minutes each. The course will be covered in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Metallurgy - Part IV and Doubt Clearing
Metallurgy - Part VI and Doubt Clearing

author.bio: A mentor to AIR 1, four 100 percentilers in JEE Mains and a guiding light to 10k+ IITians- all of these add to his exceptional achievements.
